"1. Make sure that you have the right to cancel services before you continue. 2. Cancelation of Wallpaper and personalization services won't affect the normal usage of other Xiaomi products. 3. Service cancelation is an irreversible action. Back up all the important items before you continue, as they might be deleted permanently. Remember that you won't be able to reconsider your decision once the services are canceled. The following data will be permanently deleted or anonymized after service cancelation (except as otherwise provided by laws and regulations, or otherwise required by regulatory authorities):"

"All the orders (including paid orders) made on the Xiaomi devices. You will no longer be able to use the items you purchased. All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices. All the wallpapers, fonts, and ringtones downloaded to this device. All the permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device. All the personalization items currently used on this device. Default personalization preferences will be restored."
4. Service cancelation does not imply exemption or mitigation in regard to the responsibilities brought about by actions performed prior to canceling the services.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Wallpaper and personalization. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Wallpaper and personalization provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept Wallpaper and personalization services."

"1. Make sure that you have the right to withdraw consent before you continue. 2. Your withdrawal of consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes won't affect the normal usage of other Xiaomi products. 3. Withdrawal of consent is an irreversible action. Back up all the important items before you continue, as they might be deleted permanently. Remember that you won't be able to reconsider your decision once your consent is withdrawn. The following data will be permanently deleted or anonymized after withdrawal of consent (except as otherwise provided by laws and regulations, or otherwise required by regulatory authorities):"

"All the orders (including paid orders) made on the Xiaomi devices where you used your Xiaomi Account. You will no longer be able to use the items you purchased. All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices where you used your Xiaomi Account. All the themes, wallpapers, dynamic wallpapers, fonts, icons, and ringtones downloaded to this device. All the search history records, permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device. All the personalization items currently used on this device. Default personalization preferences will be restored."

"4. After you withdraw your consent to the Privacy policy of Themes, we will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. 5. Withdrawal of consent does not imply exemption or mitigation in regard to the responsibilities brought about by actions performed prior to the withdrawal of consent."
